name: BMW X3
description: The price of BMW X3, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 68.50  - 74.90 Lakh. It is available in 3 variants, with an engine of 1995 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. X3 has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 6 airbags. BMW X3 has a ground clearance of 204 mm  and is available in 6 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 16.55 kmpl for X3.
